name: Flow Of Life
description: This artwork depicts life’s flow — a single evolving line symbolizing persistence through change. Using Perlin noise for smooth, organic curves and a time variable for motion, it generates a meditative visual of resilience and subtle transformation.

name: Rivers of Being
description: This sketch expands on Flow of Life with layered lines shaped by Perlin noise, shifting colors, and subtle trails — creating an organic, ever-changing rhythm that reflects life’s continuous motion.

name: Starlit Life
description: Flowing waves of noise dance beneath a twinkling starfield, creating a living, breathing night sky that feels full of motion and quiet energy.

name: Pulse of Life
description: This code draws a centered grid of squares with subtle random jitter. Every fourth square rotates 180°, adding dynamic irregularity. The grid shifts frame by frame, creating a lively, organic motion.

name: Chaotic Cascade
description: Hundreds of squares tumble downward with random rotations, colors, and sizes, forming a shifting, abstract grid. Bright accents pop against a dark background, while squares seamlessly loop from top to bottom. The result is a hypnotic blend of structure and randomness in constant motion.

name: Symphony of Attraction
description: Captures the dance between motion and force. Pulsing ellipses and shifting hues reflect the balance of symmetry and randomness, evoking the rhythm and unpredictability of nature. The sketch becomes a visual meditation on attraction, movement, and the fleeting beauty of dynamic interactions.

name: Love in Motion
description: A cloud of colorful particles dances across the screen, each drawn to the mouse like hearts pulled by invisible affection. Trails of glowing light trace their paths, creating a living web of vibrant love. The artwork turns interaction into a playful, flowing embrace of color and movement.
